title: Corrigenda to “Permutation polynomials over finite fields from a powerful lemma” [Finite Fields Appl. 17 (2011) 560–574], “Further results on permutation polynomials over finite fields” [Finite Fields Appl. 27 (2014) 88–103], “Permutation polynomials of the form L(x)+S2ka+S2kb over Fq3k” [Finite Fields Appl. 29 (2014) 106–117]
